entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.4°C

Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 43 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
